\cvsection{About Me}
Software Engineering student passionate about AI, problem-solving, and building smart systems. I’ve worked on projects from AI agents that generate and execute code to full-stack applications with \\ FastAPI and Angular. I’ve developed strong algorithmic thinking skills and mastered C++, gaining a deep understanding of \\
its concepts and efficient use in solving complex problems.

\cvsection{Experience}

\cvevent{\textbf{Coding Betounsi}: Software Engineer Intern}{Python, Angular, FastAPI, PostgreSQL, Git/GitHub, Debugging}{June 2025 -- September 2025}{}
\begin{itemize}[leftmargin=*]
    \item Debugged and reverse-engineered a payroll management system,\\identifying and resolving bugs in data validation and UI components.
    \item Developed the CNSS generation module, implementing UX/UI \\ for generating and managing social security files.
    \item Collaborated on refactoring the prime system, implementing date-based variant history to replace period structures and conducting code reviews.
\end{itemize}


\cvevent{\textbf{KPIT (Primatec Engineering)}: Ai Intern}{Python, LLamaindex , LLM Prompt Engineering, MistalAi}{July 2024 -- September 2024}{}
\begin{itemize}
    \item Developed a multi-language AI code generation agent supporting Python, C++, Java, and JavaScript using Streamlit for a responsive web interface.
    \item Integrated LlamaIndex with MistralAI to provide context-aware code generation, enabling the agent to respond accurately to user prompts.
    \item Implemented code execution and download features, allowing users to run and save the generated code directly from the interface.
\end{itemize}

\cvsection{Projects}

\cvevent{Point of Sale (POS) System  \href{https://github.com/AnasDrira245/PointOfSale}{\faGithub} }{Angular, FastAPI, SQLAlchemy, OAuth2}{2025}{}
\begin{itemize}
    \item Developed a full-stack POS application integrating secure authentication, employee management, and inventory tracking with robust error handling.
    \item Enhanced maintainability through code reviews, added email integration, and designed a scalable system with pagination and a detailed ERD.
\end{itemize}


\cvevent{SmartBot: Game Automation}{Python, OpenCV, PyAutoGUI, YOLOv4-tiny}{2024}{}
\begin{itemize}
    \item Collected and labeled game image datasets, trained a YOLOv4-tiny model, and implemented real-time object detection for automated gameplay.
    \item Developed automated task execution using mouse/keyboard control and OpenCV template matching for precise in-game actions.
\end{itemize}
